scripts.build-ios-debug: cd ios; xcodebuild -UseModernBuildSystem=NO -scheme 'appiumTutorial' -sdk iphonesimulator -configuration Debug -derivedDataPath build/app; zip -r app-debug.zip build/app/Build/Products/Debug-iphonesimulator/*.app
scripts.build-ios-release: cd ios; xcodebuild -UseModernBuildSystem=NO -scheme 'appiumTutorial' -sdk iphonesimulator -configuration Release -derivedDataPath build/app; zip -r app-release.zip build/app/Build/Products/Release-iphonesimulator/*.app
